pixelbar is currently sddsfs

Contact

We're the hackerspace of Rotterdam since 2015.

Opening hours:
Every Wednesday - from 7pm
Every Saturday - from 2pm

If the spatestate says it's open, but the door isn't, please call the number below.

Contact

Telephone : +31 (0) 10 7171 591
IRC : #pixelbar at smurfnet.ch
Slack : pixelbar.herokuapp.com Feel free to invite yourself.
Email : bestuur@pixelbar.nl.

Mailing List : Pixelbar has a mailinglist for general communication. You can subscribe yourself here

Location

Our Address is :

Vierhavensstraat 56
3029 BG Rotterdam

Lat : 51.910111
Lon : 4.433988

We’re located in the Keilewerf. There is (limited) parking space available and if you go with public transportation: you can take the stop at Marconiplein and walk you way up towards the KFC and take a left into the Vierhavensstraat. After about 450 meters, you’ll be at our building (recognisable by all of the street art on the exterior of the building).

Spacestate

Allmost every hackerspace has a way of letting visitors know if the space is open. This is called a SpaceState. At Pixelbar we also implemented a spacestate switch which is toggled by the first participant entering the hackerspace, and is toggled to close when the last participant leaves. You will find the current spacestate on the top of this website. If you follow us on twitter : @pixelbar010, You will see a tweet everytime the switch is toggled. If you use Pushover we can even send you a push message via the link here

If you call Pixelbar, a voice system will tell you if we’re open at that moment.

Organisational
